item.description:
Hello Boston Chihuahua Lovers!

 

We're back to our normal second Sunday of the month (weather permitting!) We rent the room for 2 hours, so you can come and go or stay the entire time! The training room is large with folding chairs for seating, though some of us choose to sit on the floor. Feel free to bring anything you like- camera, treats, toys, etc.

Handicapped access is available (ask front desk staff to take you down in the elevator) and a convenient restroom located right off of the room! As always, dogs should be up to date on vaccinations- no paperwork required.

BONUS: The retail store gives us coupons to use the same day, usually $5 off of $25 or more. Good time to stock up on food and accessories!!

 

See you then!

-Aimee

Some information about the venue

Red Dog Pet Resort & Spa is Boston’s newest 43,000 sq ft. pet boarding facility offering the ultimate pet experience providing care for your pet like it is one of our own.

 

 

Red Dog’s state-of-the art facility offers:

  • 24/7 on site professional staffing
  • A wide array of boarding options, including luxury theme suites
  • An indoor Aquatic Center & Daycare
  • Animal Pickup & Delivery
  • Grooming & Spa Services
  • Chiropractic Care
  • Veterinary Services
  • Retail

For more information, please visit www.bostonreddog.com

 

 

Hope to see you all there!

-Aimee
item.name: Indoor Meet @ Boston Red Dog
